nodes.text: Thulpin Guard was an Imperial-allied military unit maintained on the planet Draenell's Point during the Galactic Civil War as part of the Planetary Guard. They wore grey and red uniforms, with a white helmet trimmed with red. The Thulpin Guard were comprised of eight soldiers, armed with heavy blaster pistols and vibro-axs, as well as a heavy repeating blaster. They fought in the Battle of Bissillirus, during the planetary raid on agricultural loading platform XT-21s.
